description.narrative: Funding under this initiative supports a joint donor program being implemented by The Asia Foundation (TAF) and United Kingdom Department for International Development (DFID) for activities to strengthen the Afghan Ministry for Agriculture Irrigation and Livestock (MAIL). AusAID is supporting the program along with the UK, Canada and the Netherlands. The program is implemented over two phases. Phase 1 managed by TAF and phase 2 by DFID. Phase 1 deliverables include: supporting MAIL's Executive in oversight of policy and program decisions and liaison with other ministries and donors; workshops on the process of reform and developing diagnostic and assessment tools to enable planning and implementing change; recruitment and training of local staff in critical areas of MAIL; assisting MAIL in the establishment of information and communications technology (ICT) hardware and services, including internet and server connectivity, creation of helpdesk support and establishment of a team with r
